name: Corona.io
description:
Description:

Its year 2030 and coronavirus is still here, but its getting more and more deadly. 

You are mr. Square, member of elite group of doctors, but beware! The virus is getting stronger and more durable. 

How many people can you save before corona kill you? 

Controls:

W: Move up

A: Move left

S: Move down

D: Move right

Left click: Shooting

B: Build menu/heal (If you wanna heal, just left-click on the heal button. If you wanna build something, click the button of that building and then put the cursor on place where you wanna build it and click again, the game is stopped when build menu is opened)

Please write your feedback down to comments, i will use it to upgrade the game
